title: Best Income Stocks to Buy for January 10th - January 10, 2025 - Zacks.com
text:
Here are three stocks with buy rank and strong income characteristics for investors to consider today, January 10:
HSBC Holdings plc ( HSBC Quick Quote HSBC - Free Report ) : This banking and financial services provider has witnessed the Zacks Consensus Estimate for its current year earnings increasing 5.5% the last 60 days.
HSBC Holdings plc Price and Consensus HSBC Holdings plc price-consensus-chart | HSBC Holdings plc Quote
This Zacks Rank #1 company has a dividend yield of 4.0%, compared with the industry average of 3.7%.

AngloGold Ashanti plc ( AU Quick Quote AU - Free Report ) : This gold mining company has witnessed the Zacks Consensus Estimate for its current year earnings increasing 2.8% the last 60 days.

This Zacks Rank #1 company has a dividend yield of 1.8%, compared with the industry average of 0.0%.

The Charles Schwab Corporation ( SCHW Quick Quote SCHW - Free Report ) : This savings and loan holding company has witnessed the Zacks Consensus Estimate for its current year earnings increasing 0.6% in the last 60 days.
